name: Shopp + Mediaburst
author: Lorenzo Orlando Caum, Enzo12 LLC

sections.description:
This plugin integrates Shopp with Mediaburst.

This plugin adds text message notifications for new orders.

After checkout, the merchant will receive a text message with new order information.

This process occurs in the background without needing action from the customer.

NOTICE: Mediaburst has renamed their SMS Gateway to Clockwork. Learn more about the Clockwork API

sections.installation:
1. You’ll need to have an account with Mediaburst
  2. Ensure that your Shopp is activated and up-to-date.
  3. Download Shopp + Mediaburst. Unzip the shopp-mediaburst folder.
  4. Upload the shopp-mediaburst folder to the wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  5. Activate Shopp + Mediaburst through the Plugins menu in the WordPress admin.
  6. Go to Shopp 101 → + Mediaburst.
  7. Enter your Username, Password, and your Mobile Phone Number including country calling code for Mediaburst and click Save Settings.
sections.faq:
How do I get an account with Mediaburst?

Visit mediaburst.co.uk to register for an account.

What is Shopp and how do I get it?

Shopp is an ecommerce plugin for WordPress. Learn more about Shopp.

Are there any other extensions available for Shopp?

Yes, there are different extensions available including emailing marketing, short message service (sms) notifications, forms & reporting, help desk, and more. Please visit Shopp 101.
